description: Christina Carter is a name closely associated with laughing, screaming, cursing orgasms and this update will be sure to keep her reputation intact. She just can't keep her mouth shut when it comes to following directions and speaking civil. This week you will follow Christina as she tries to behave but still just ends up being a brat and being punished for it over & over again... Like she really minds ;-)
title: Christine is back for more screaming orgasms
